doc: When the GWT (app running on Google Chrome) tries to build a object from a json throws the exception:
If the class to be parsed only have String fields works fine, even though they are private fields. The error occurs when the class have Floats and Longs.
By the way, I also tested on the last nightly build, the classes are declared at the gwt.xml to be included on the reflection process, have a default constructor, getters and setters.
